title: A Flask/AWS Rekogniton Implementation of Silicon Valley's 'Not Hot Dog'
author: palferrari
content: readme.md nothotdognothotdog is flask/aws rekognition implementation silicon valley's ' hot dog' app.building locallynothotdog runs python 2.7.* install setuptools you don't it, it running (pip):pip install setuptoolsclone repo:git clone https://github.com/ryanml/nothotdognavigate the project root, run:python setup.py install the label detection relies aws' rekognition service, 'll need have aws cli client installed. may install information hereonce is installed, 'll enter aws iam creds running:aws configure project serve locally port 5000 running:python -m nothotdog is work progress, front-end contributions welcome!demo:http://nothotdog.ryanlane.se
